titles: The second and third advice to a painter, for drawing the history of our navall actions, the two last years, 1665 and 1666 in answer to Mr. Waller.
author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.
Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.
notes: "Attributed to Sir John Denham, but most probably not by him. Sometimes attributed to Andrew Marvell." Cf. BM.
Reproduction of originals in the Duke University Library and the  British Library.
keywords: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687. --  Instructions to a painter.
